messages.subject: from batman
messages.body:
Attn sir,


My name is Batman Cole, i am the managing director of Prudent Bank PLC here in Nigeria, on 20th Novmber 2004 MR. Haryanto Tomo from indonesia, deposited the sum of U$10million dollars with our bank here in Nigeria, up till then i did not head from him not until when i received a news that there was a tsunami in asia that kill thousands of indonesia's, include one of nigerian Prudent customer Mr. Haryanto.



Right now i am contacting you to know if you can help me to receive the money over there as his relatives or next of kin, since all my effort to locate his family with the telephone number he gave me (62853700612) proved nothing, if you are willing to do this deal, you should not in any reason tell anybody about this transaction until you

confirm the money in your account/home, because all we need is to get the document of (change of onwership account from the federal high court) on your

behalf. Always call me on my direct line+ 234-80-331-27-410 for security reasons

or email me on: batmancole5@katamail.com



Waiting for your call now

Batman cole
messages.raw:
BATMAN COLE

Subject: from batman
Date: Wed, 27 Apr 2005

Attn sir,

My name is Batman Cole, i am the managing director of Prudent Bank PLC here in Nigeria, on 20th Novmber 2004 MR. Haryanto Tomo from indonesia, deposited the sum of U$10million dollars with our bank here in Nigeria, up till then i did not head from him not until when i received a news that there was a tsunami in asia that kill thousands of indonesia's, include one of nigerian Prudent customer Mr. Haryanto.

Right now i am contacting you to know if you can help me to receive the money over there as his relatives or next of kin, since all my effort to locate his family with the telephone number he gave me (62853700612) proved nothing, if you are willing to do this deal, you should not in any reason tell anybody about this transaction until you confirm the money in your account/home, because all we need is to get the document of (change of onwership account from the federal high court) on your behalf. Always call me on my direct line+ 234-80-331-27-410 for security reasons or email me on: batmancole5@katamail.com

Waiting for your call now

Batman cole

messages.body:
Dear Batman (is that a nickname?),

I have tried to call you several times on this matter,
however the calls do not go through.  I believe I can
work with you on this.

Bruce Banner
messages.raw:
BRUCE BANNER

Date: 27 Apr 2005

Dear Batman (is that a nickname?),

I have tried to call you several times on this matter, however the calls do not go through. I believe I can work with you on this.

Bruce Banner

messages.body:
Received: 	from  by web60807.mail.yahoo.com



  Attn Bruce Banner,
  
Thanks for your mail to me, nothing happened to my line or you can also reach me at +234 1475 1439, all i need from you is your truth and understanding for this money to be wired into your account as next of kin to late mr Tomo.

  All i need from you now before the ideal can go on
  is,
  
  1 Your age
  
  2 Your occupation
  
  3 Your telephone number
  
  4 Your account details where the money will be
  transferred.
  
  More details will be given to you as soon as i
  receive all this information to know if i should
  work with you or not, because i dont want to joke
 on
  this transaction that is why i need your age.
  
   
  
  Thanks
  
  Batman
messages.raw:
BATMAN COLE

Received: from [170.135.241.46] by web60807.mail.yahoo.com
Date: Wed, 27 Apr 2005

Attn Bruce Banner,

Thanks for your mail to me, nothing happened to my line or you can also reach me at +234 1475 1439, all i need from you is your truth and understanding for this money to be wired into your account as next of kin to late mr Tomo.

All i need from you now before the ideal can go on is,
1 Your age
2 Your occupation
3 Your telephone number
4 Your account details where the money will be transferred.

More details will be given to you as soon as i receive all this information to know if i should work with you or not, because i dont want to joke on this transaction that is why i need your age.

Thanks
Batman

messages.body:
Dear Batman, (have to get used to that name)
 
 I tried the your phone number. After hearing a
 woman's
 voice, I heard in the background what sounded much
 like a ping-pong tournament.
 
 I am a 53 year old scientist.  My telephone number
 is
 +34 XXX XXX XXX  and my fax is 661 XXX XXXX.
 
 Would it be possible to transfer all funds via
 federal
 express courier or western union money transfer?
 
 Bruce Banner
messages.raw:
BRUCE BANNER

Date: 28 Apr 2005

Dear Batman, (have to get used to that name)

I tried the your phone number. After hearing a woman's voice, I heard in the background what sounded much like a ping-pong tournament.

I am a 53 year old scientist. My telephone number is +34 XXX XXX XXX and my fax is 661 XXX XXXX.

Would it be possible to transfer all funds via federal express courier or western union money transfer?

Bruce Banner

messages.body:
Dear Bruce Banner,
  
 Thanks for your mail to me, from the tone of your
 mail i dont think you are seroius to do this
 transaction, I am not yet married, so how come you
 said that you heard a little baby crying on my
 phone, please let be up and doing.
 It is not possible to send the money through western
 union, but we have two methods of sending money
 which it tele-graphic wire transafer (KTT) and
 diplomatic means of transfer.
 But before this, we are going to secure the change
 of account onwership from the federal high court
 like i told you before, which i dont know how much
 that will cost. Call me on any of my numbers for
 more details on the method of transfer on which one
 will be ok for you.
  
 Thanks
 Batman cole.
 Tele 234 80331 27410 or 234 1 475 1439
messages.raw:
BATMAN COLE

Dear Bruce Banner,

Thanks for your mail to me, from the tone of your mail i dont think you are seroius to do this transaction, I am not yet married, so how come you said that you heard a little baby crying on my phone, please let be up and doing.
It is not possible to send the money through western union, but we have two methods of sending money which it tele-graphic wire transafer (KTT) and diplomatic means of transfer.
But before this, we are going to secure the change of account onwership from the federal high court like i told you before, which i dont know how much that will cost. Call me on any of my numbers for more details on the method of transfer on which one will be ok for you.

Thanks
Batman cole.
Tele 234 80331 27410 or 234 1 475 1439

messages.body:
Dear Batman,

Thank you for your speedy reply.  I most certainly am
serious, I have not time for trivial matters, I can
assure you.  I am not familiar with the transfer
methods you mention, please explain them to me.

I have been having very poor luck trying to phone you.
 So in the interest of saving time, please call me
once you have secured the change of account onwership
from the federal high court.

Bruce Banner
messages.raw:
BRUCE BANNER

Date: 28 Apr 2005

Dear Batman,

Thank you for your speedy reply. I most certainly am serious, I have not time for trivial matters, I can assure you. I am not familiar with the transfer methods you mention, please explain them to me.

I have been having very poor luck trying to phone you. So in the interest of saving time, please call me once you have secured the change of account onwership from the federal high court.

Bruce Banner

messages.body:
Dear Bruce Banner,
  
 Thanks for your mail to me once more, the KTT wire
 transfer, is the method of sending money into your
 receving bank account, while the other method is a
 way of sending money to you through a diplomatic
 means with a security box. The change of account
 name from the federal high court is what I can not
 do only, because right now i dont have all that
 money at hand, so i will be very happy for you to
 open up and tell me how we can do about it.
  
 Final send to me your account number for the change
 immediately.
 Thanks
 Batman
 What type of number you gave me? are you in America?
messages.raw:
BATMAN COLE

Dear Bruce Banner,

Thanks for your mail to me once more, the KTT wire transfer, is the method of sending money into your receving bank account, while the other method is a way of sending money to you through a diplomatic means with a security box. The change of account name from the federal high court is what I can not do only, because right now i dont have all that money at hand, so i will be very happy for you to open up and tell me how we can do about it.

Final send to me your account number for the change immediately.
Thanks
Batman
What type of number you gave me? are you in America?

messages.body:
Dear Batman,

Let me see if I understand the situation we have here.


I never met you, you are a total stranger.  You are
making an unsubstantiated claim about a large sum of
money to be transferred into my personal bank account.

At the same time you are asking me for my personal
bank account information and now you are asking me to
help you figure out your money problems.

Boy I wonder if you realize the pair of cahones you
have to even go in the direction you are going with
me.
I may be green with these kind of things, but this all
sounds so incredible. Convince me otherwise.

Bruce Banner
messages.raw:
BRUCE BANNER

Date: 28 Apr 2005

Dear Batman,

Let me see if I understand the situation we have here.

I never met you, you are a total stranger. You are making an unsubstantiated claim about a large sum of money to be transferred into my personal bank account.

At the same time you are asking me for my personal bank account information and now you are asking me to help you figure out your money problems.

Boy I wonder if you realize the pair of cahones you have to even go in the direction you are going with me.
I may be green with these kind of things, but this all sounds so incredible. Convince me otherwise.

Bruce Banner

messages.body:
Dear Bruce Banner,

I am in recipt of your mail, and the content well
noted. Yes i dont know you from adam, but thank God
that we have open communication with each other
through email, yes i know it is very hard for an
unknow person to ask you for your bank account, on
this reason i will like you to open a fresh account
number for this buiness, so that you will not have
anything in your mind concerning this transfer. 

Secondly, I am not trying to be smart or good, NO i
am only trying to see if we can work this out by
transferring the money into your account as the next
of kin to Mr. Tomo, that is why i asked you to help
me in getting the vital document from the federal
high court to enable our bank transfer this money
into your account without much question or
investication. The fee is some how much for me to
take care, had it been i have all the money for the
document i could'nt have asked you for help. I will
like you to go back to my first mail to you, you
will see where i made mention of the change of name
of account, and without this nothing will be done,
mind you that i will be also taken care of the
Attorney that will stand on your behalf at the high
court for the vital document.

On this issue, i will like you to forward to me your
house address.

Thanks
Batman
messages.raw:
BATMAN COLE

Dear Bruce Banner,

I am in recipt of your mail, and the content well noted. Yes i dont know you from adam, but thank God that we have open communication with each other through email, yes i know it is very hard for an unknow person to ask you for your bank account, on this reason i will like you to open a fresh account number for this buiness, so that you will not have anything in your mind concerning this transfer.

Secondly, I am not trying to be smart or good, NO i am only trying to see if we can work this out by transferring the money into your account as the next of kin to Mr. Tomo, that is why i asked you to help me in getting the vital document from the federal high court to enable our bank transfer this money into your account without much question or investication. The fee is some how much for me to take care, had it been i have all the money for the document i could'nt have asked you for help. I will like you to go back to my first mail to you, you will see where i made mention of the change of name of account, and without this nothing will be done, mind you that i will be also taken care of the Attorney that will stand on your behalf at the high court for the vital document.

On this issue, i will like you to forward to me your house address.

Thanks
Batman

messages.body:
Batman,

Opening an account is not a problem, it would have to
be a legitimate account in my name.  What kind of fee
are we talking about?  You keep mentioning a fee, that
it's too much for you, but you never said how much it
is.  Of course I need to see some proof that this is a
real situation regardless.

Bruce Banner
messages.raw:
BRUCE BANNER

Batman,

Opening an account is not a problem, it would have to be a legitimate account in my name. What kind of fee are we talking about? You keep mentioning a fee, that it's too much for you, but you never said how much it is. Of course I need to see some proof that this is a real situation regardless.

Bruce Banner

messages.body:
Batman,

I have sent you my IBAN number, my cellular and my fax
numbers.  You are obviously not well versed in such
affairs, as this was more than sufficient information
and you should know that.

So far you have not provided me with anything, and at
the same time suggesting I should help you with a
portion of a $15,000 bill.  I think the ball is now in
your court.  If you don't provide something in good
faith in your next correspondence I will know you are
just looking for a handout.

Bruce Banner
messages.raw:
BRUCE BANNER

Date: 29 Apr 2005

Batman,

I have sent you my IBAN number, my cellular and my fax numbers. You are obviously not well versed in such affairs, as this was more than sufficient information and you should know that.

So far you have not provided me with anything, and at the same time suggesting I should help you with a portion of a $15,000 bill. I think the ball is now in your court. If you don't provide something in good faith in your next correspondence I will know you are just looking for a handout.

Bruce Banner

messages.body:
Dear Bruce Banner,
  
 I dont think that you understand that there is
 something we call miss-direction of fund, which i
 will not allowe to happen on this transaction,
 please state your account details very well with the
 name of the bank to avoid any probelm.
  
 Now you can see the reason why i need your help on
 the issue of the document, had it been the money is
 lesser, i could have done everything by myself, so
 let me know how much you can be able to raise from
 your side.
  
 I will also like you to state your telephone number
 very well too and your house address.
  
 Thanks
 Batman
messages.raw:
BATMAN COLE

Dear Bruce Banner,

I dont think that you understand that there is something we call miss-direction of fund, which i will not allowe to happen on this transaction, please state your account details very well with the name of the bank to avoid any probelm.

Now you can see the reason why i need your help on the issue of the document, had it been the money is lesser, i could have done everything by myself, so let me know how much you can be able to raise from your side.

I will also like you to state your telephone number very well too and your house address.

Thanks
Batman

messages.body:
Batman,

At this point how much money I can raise is a moot
point.  Certainly if there is one iota of truth to
your claims, raising the money would not be difficult.
 As a matter of fact it is rather hard for me to
believe this would be an obstacle for you.  You whole
proposal is shifting from assisting you to share in a
very large sum of money, to helping you raise a rather
insignificant amount by comparison.  

If you cannot substantiate your rather fantastic claim
then please stop wasting my time.

Bruce Banner
messages.raw:
BRUCE BANNER

Date: 29 Apr 2005

Batman,

At this point how much money I can raise is a moot point. Certainly if there is one iota of truth to your claims, raising the money would not be difficult. As a matter of fact it is rather hard for me to believe this would be an obstacle for you. You whole proposal is shifting from assisting you to share in a very large sum of money, to helping you raise a rather insignificant amount by comparison.

If you cannot substantiate your rather fantastic claim then please stop wasting my time.

Bruce Banner

messages.body:
Dear Bruce Banner,
 I am in recipt of your three mails and all the
 informationa well understood. My dear first of all
 let me be picking the points one after another.
 1 You made mention of the bill of U$15thousand, i am
 not telling you to send the whole U$15 to me, i am
 only trying to inform you the reason why I need your
 help on that issue.
 2, You made mention of not know if these is real or
 not? there is no how i can tell you that this is
 real, than you receving the change of account/name
 from the high court and you receving the funds in
 your account, the reason why all this, is that if I
 should submit your name and account direct to the
 bank, they will ask you to come down to Nigeria and
 claim your relatives funds, by providing this
 document from court. Or do you want to come to
 Nigeria so that you can see things with your eyes?
 3, You made mention of not telling the amount needed
 from you to send, right now i have in my hands
 U$5,000.00 dollars and still looking for more money,
 it is left for you to tell me how much you can come
 up with, to enable me know the amount i will be
 looking for.
  
 Finaly the issue of your sending me your contact
 details, is what I dont understand, because i have
 tried serval times to reach you on the telephone but
 it is not going through, moreover you refused to
 send to me your house address up till now which i
 belive that you have something in mind as soon as
 the money is transferred. Right now i am not yet ok
 with all your information, if you still want us to
 do this, let me have your full information as i have
 stated it to you, before telling me anything about
 the money, because that is very very important to
 me.
  
 Thanks
 Batman
messages.raw:
BATMAN COLE

Dear Bruce Banner,
I am in recipt of your three mails and all the informationa well understood. My dear first of all let me be picking the points one after another.
1 You made mention of the bill of U$15thousand, i am not telling you to send the whole U$15 to me, i am only trying to inform you the reason why I need your help on that issue.
2, You made mention of not know if these is real or not? there is no how i can tell you that this is real, than you receving the change of account/name from the high court and you receving the funds in your account, the reason why all this, is that if I should submit your name and account direct to the bank, they will ask you to come down to Nigeria and claim your relatives funds, by providing this document from court. Or do you want to come to Nigeria so that you can see things with your eyes?
3, You made mention of not telling the amount needed from you to send, right now i have in my hands U$5,000.00 dollars and still looking for more money, it is left for you to tell me how much you can come up with, to enable me know the amount i will be looking for.

Finaly the issue of your sending me your contact details, is what I dont understand, because i have tried serval times to reach you on the telephone but it is not going through, moreover you refused to send to me your house address up till now which i belive that you have something in mind as soon as the money is transferred. Right now i am not yet ok with all your information, if you still want us to do this, let me have your full information as i have stated it to you, before telling me anything about the money, because that is very very important to me.

Thanks
Batman

because of the money i ask you to send so that we
can get the vital document from the high court
right?
Thanks
Batman

messages.body:
Batman,

I have the money.  But what is this photo of?  I don't
understand.  Is that supposed to be you?  What is this
picture supposed to prove?  I could send you a photo
of me standing next to a Mercedes, it doesn't mean I
own it.

Bruce Banner

messages.body:
Who are you? are you an agent? how can you ask me to
send the account number to you, is better for me to
look for another person which i have been doing
before you started emailing me again, i dont think
it is wise to send to you the account number where
the money is now.
I have to take my place now and end this deal from
here, as i have found out that you are not willing
to do this transaction, i am not after your money,
you can keep and eat your money, because i dont know
what will happen next if finaly the money is
transferred into your account. 
I am not sending any more information to you ok, if
you want us to conclude this deal, you keep on
asking for information upon information, but it took
you two weeks to send just your house address, who
knows if the address is not fake, what of your
international passport and your name of your bank
nothing, you only send an unknow number and told me
that's your account number, ok let me know the name
of your bank you did not want to tell me up till
today.

The telephone you gave me is not going through,
please lets end this deal from here bye.
Batman

I have to take my place now and end this deal from here, as i have found out that you are not willing to do this transaction, i am not after your money, you can keep and eat your money, because i dont know what will happen next if finaly the money is transferred into your account.
I am not sending any more information to you ok, if you want us to conclude this deal, you keep on asking for information upon information, but it took you two weeks to send just your house address, who knows if the address is not fake, what of your international passport and your name of your bank nothing, you only send an unknow number and told me that's your account number, ok let me know the name of your bank you did not want to tell me up till today.

The telephone you gave me is not going through, please lets end this deal from here bye.
Batman

messages.body:
May 5

Riddle me this Batman,

What do you expect from me?  Do you expect me to
believe there are people out there just waiting to
send a stranger money based upon some wild claim of a
large fund and a meaningless photo?  You have shown me
nothing, so  I have completely lost interest in this.

By the way, the phone number works, have you tried
calling me on the batphone?

Bruce Banner
